name: Blackthorne's Notched Belt
flavorText: A thick leather belt, notched once for each enemy noble captured in battle, each man ransomed back to his family for a handsome fee.
flavorTextHtml: A thick leather belt, notched once for each enemy noble captured in battle, each man ransomed back to his family for a handsome fee.

secondary.textHtml: +[32 - 35]% Extra Gold from Monsters

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 +250 Vitality    
 Increases damage against elites by 10.0%(3) Set:     
 Reduces damage from elites by 10.0%    
 +25% Extra Gold from Monsters(4) Set:     
 You are immune to Desecrator, Molten, and Plagued monster ground effects.
